overview: Cartoon Crazys 1 movie was released Nov 10, 1997 by the Wellspring studio. A collection of a dozen classic cartoons, featuring such favorite characters as Bugs Bunny, Felix the Cat, Elmer Fudd, Tweety, Porky Pig, Daffy Duck, Abbott & Costello, and the original Superman demo.  The release includes the following cartoons:  T1- Intro  T2- Falling Hare - 43 (imdb#tt0035861)  T3- Yankee Doodle Daffy - 43 (imdb#tt0036546)  T4- Tale of Two Kitties - 42 (imdb#tt0035414)  T5- Neptune Nonsense - 36 (imdb#tt0141654)  T6- Crowing Pains - 47 (imdb#tt0039287)  T7- Robin Hood Makes Good - 39 (imdb#tt0031869)  T8- Fresh Hare - 42 (imdb#tt0034756)  T9- Trolley Ahoy - 36 (imdb#tt0153300)  T10- Daffy the Commando - 43 (imdb#tt0035774)  T11- Have You Got Any Castles - 38 (imdb#tt0030215)  T12- Gabby Goes Fishing - 41 (imdb#tt0033643)  T13- Corny Concerto - 43 (imdb#tt0035754)  T14- Cartoon Restoration Demo  T15- Preview of Cartoon Crazys volume 2  T16- The Original Superman Demo - 41
title: Cartoon Crazys 1
